### ***Industrial Cleaning Services Tender Announcement***

#### ***Contract Reference: W3554-236351***

The Department of National Defence, CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia is seeking expressions of interest and proposals for the provision of comprehensive industrial cleaning services for multiple Fleet Maintenance Facility Cape Scott (FMFCS) facilities and for HMC Ships, Submarines & CFAV Vessels at CFB Halifax.

**Contract Period and Options:**
- The contract period will commence on February 1, 2024 for a two-year term with the option to extend for three additional one-year periods, bringing the total maximum contract duration to five years.

**Key Requirements:**

* Compliance with all contractual and regulatory requirements
* Provision of Industrial Cleaning Services for multiple FMFCS facilities, HMC Ships, Submarines, and CFAV Vessels at CFB Halifax
* Attend a compulsory site visit to be conducted on December 20, 2023

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Lowest Price

**Terms of Engagement:**
- Suppliers are responsive for providing a comprehensive scope of work and baseline specification
- The procurement process is set up with trade agreements in place, specifically:
  * Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
  * Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
  * World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
  * Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
  * Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)

**How to Respond:**

* Submit an expression of interest or proposal via the following link: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18195107?extsite=MTgxOTUxMDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18195107?extsite=MTgxOTUxMDdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Accessing Contract Information:**
- The Contracting Authority will assign a specific time slot for the site visit; confirmation and attendance details are noted above.

---

* All responses will be treated in strict confidence.

---

Contact: Matthew Furlong
Email: [matthew.Furlong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:matthew.Furlong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
